Reviews.Title: Waterproof? No not really
Reviews.Author: booda
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera in April of 12' specifically for a trip I planned to Mexico in December. I had time to get used to using it, my big mistake was not trying it out in the pool. Four days into our trip we got to do some snorkeling (the reason I bought the camera in the first place). The camera worked great for about two hours afterward. It was in salt water so after we got out I rinsed it gently with fresh water and towel dried it. When we were on the bus back to the hotel I wanted review the pics I took and when I turned the screen on it was black. The camera still worked but the screen was out of commission. So four days into my seven day trip my camera was worthless. Upon returning home I contacted Nikon for warranty service which was not without aggravation, I'll spare the details. They're promise was to return it to me within 7 to 10 days. It's been ten days so far and they still have the camera. I was not impressed with the service from anyone I spoke to at Nikon and after using their "waterproof to 33 ft" in three feet of water and have it fail miserably I wouldn't recommend this camera or any Nikon product after my experience.

Reviews.Title: AW 100 NIKON COOLPIX
Reviews.Author: Joseph Patrick McGee "BIG JOE"
Reviews.Content: THE PACKAGE DEAL IS THE WAY TO GO. I PURCHASED THE COOLPIX FOR MY HUNTING AND FISHING TRIPS. I NO LONGER HAVE TO WORRY ABOUT THE WEATHER EFFECTING MY CAMERA. IT TAKES FAIRLY GOOD PICTURES AND SO FAR I'M VERY HAPPY.

Reviews.Title: great for a 2nd camera
Reviews.Author: Karen4Kindle "Kindle Fanatic"
Reviews.Content: Takes good pictures - the shockproof and waterproof features are great.  If you are really into taking pictures, you will still want another camera.The bundled package is a great deal - definitely go this route!

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Amanda R. Morris "Amanda R. Morris"
Reviews.Content: LOVE this camera! This kit was perfect, maybe even overkill a bit.  Great products, never been so happy with a digital camera/accessories!

Reviews.Title: GREAT Camera
Reviews.Author: Sulleybug "Peaches"
Reviews.Content: My son purchased this camera and he loves it and so do I.  The camera takes great pictures underwater too.  Plus it takes great pictures overall.

Reviews.Title: Picture Perfect
Reviews.Author: Duane
Reviews.Content: Brought this camera for travel purposes and went to Caribbean and tried it out right out of the box and liked it.  Worked great in the water both above and below the floatations device worked great camera never sunk to bottom.  Pictures were clear and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: iTS ALL NICE BUT..
Reviews.Author: Claudia Rodriguez Pagoaga "Claudia Rodriguez"
Reviews.Content: YOU DONT NEED THAT MUCH STUFF. Of this kit I only find usefull the floating strap, one of the tripods and the SD card, with the extra batrtery i have my doubts because on the users manual they recomend only using the nikkon brand batteries to assure your cameras life, you dont need more cables, with the ones that the camera's box has is enogh.

Reviews.Title: My Wife just love it
Reviews.Author: Sal Tocco
Reviews.Content: Wejust love everything about this camera, we both swim alot and love that we can bring the camera with us

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Br
Reviews.Content: This camera is wonderful and the value pack was a great deal. It takes great pictures and is easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Up Date
Reviews.Author: Gustavo Paiva
Reviews.Content: I like this product, it worked for me. I recommend!I like this product, it worked for me. I recommend!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Francois Castejon
Reviews.Content: met all my expectations, great camera overall. Takes nice pictures and video underwater, easy to handle functions.Though sometimes takes time to adjust when shooting and some blurry pictures came out.

Reviews.Title: so far its great
Reviews.Author: damian hilgendorf
Reviews.Content: easy to use.  all the extras were very nice.  still not sure if i am going to try it in the water.

Reviews.Title: Purchased as a Christmas gift
Reviews.Author: Marilyn Milner
Reviews.Content: Received order on time. Gift recipient was very happy with it! Would definetly recommend this to anyone needing a camera for outdoor use.

Reviews.Title: A some buy for travelers!
Reviews.Author: Carlos
Reviews.Content: This camera took a betting and just kept working. We took it diving and hiking it gave us everything the information said it would.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Lamar Woods
Reviews.Content: Great camera - our last one got wet and stopped working so it is nice to have the extra protection.

Reviews.Title: Perfect bundle!!!
Reviews.Author: Geo
Reviews.Content: Firstly, if you are going to buy this camera, buy it in this bundle. You will not regret your choice. Perfect as a gift too!Recently purchased the AW100 Nikon Coolpix camera, and decided to get the accessory kit. It is the perfect thing to get when purchasing a camera. It comes with all sorts of goodies. I havent individually priced out each item and added it all up, but it still seems like a great deal for all the stuff you get with it. Both tripods are solid, the floating strap seems like it would do great, the extra battery is always a plus, and since i dont have a mini HDMI cable this is perfect to view videos and pictures on an HD tv. All the accessories that it comes with are high quality and are well worth the price.As for the camera, it is awesome. I bout this camera because I am outdoors a lot, and have clumsy hands. I didnt want to worry about having to drop my camera and be concerned whether or not it will be damaged. The construction of the camera is super solid, it feels like you could not out a wild animal if you threw it at it. The pictures are great at close to medium range, but at long distances especially when zoomed all the way it gets a little poopy. The videos you can record are top notch, no need for a camcorder now!The GPS function is so handy, most cameras should come with this feature, especially if your an outdoors person. Have yet to test the waterproofness of the camera, so I am hoping that this will work when the time comes. The camera definitely does what you want it to do, and since it is a Nikon you know you got the goods. I am in no way a picky person, so this camera is perfect. If are disposed to pick everything apart and complain about every little thing, than you may not agree with me.PROS-Solid desing-Great pictures when close or at medium distance-Videos are amazing-Features are great-compact, easy to use-color of the camera is vibrant and great looking-if you got the orange color you wont be loosing it when oustide.CONS-Long distance shots not so good-A little slow- only a few seconds after each shot. Might find this an issue if you like things to be  instantaneous.If you are looking to get a tough camera, get the Nikon AW100, and get it with this bundle.

Reviews.Title: easy to use
Reviews.Author: Elaghaka
Reviews.Content: Light, strong and easy to use. this device has all of necesary things to get outdor pictures.  Price is ok!

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: Christian D. Howarth
Reviews.Content: The pictures are a little grainy and distorted looking. Maybe I should keep practicing. But havent used it underwater yet.

Reviews.Title: So far Super!
Reviews.Author: sandyswim
Reviews.Content: My product came very quickly and in perfect condition. I've taken quite a few photos and they are very clear. It's easy to use but I haven't tried itin the water yet or the GPS. I need to review the use on that but so far I'm very pleased. Would recommened it.
